red.short: Energy, passion, and primal life force.
red.long: Red stimulates vitality and courage, awakening the root chakra. Scientifically, it is linked to longer light waves that activate the bodyâ€™s alert systems.

orange.long: Orange harmonizes emotions and enhances creativity. It resonates with the sacral chakra and inspires enthusiasm.

yellow.long: Yellow stimulates the mind and helps decision making. It resonates with the solar plexus chakra, boosting willpower and personal strength.

green.long: Green represents harmony and nature. It resonates with the heart chakra, promoting growth, healing, and emotional stability.

turquoise.long: Turquoise connects heart and throat chakras. It clears emotional blockages and enhances truth in communication.

blue.long: Blue resonates with the throat chakra. It enhances inner peace, clarity, and expression of truth.

indigo.long: Indigo stimulates the third eye chakra, awakening intuition and deeper insight into reality.

violet.long: Violet aligns with the crown chakra, guiding connection to universal wisdom and transcendence.

pink.long: Pink represents gentle love energy. It soothes emotional pain and nurtures self-acceptance.

white.long: White contains all colors of the spectrum. It symbolizes spiritual awakening and wholeness.

black.long: Black absorbs all light and symbolizes the void. It represents protection, rest, and the hidden mysteries of creation.

grey.long: Grey represents detachment and calm neutrality. It can signify both indecision and inner peace.
